Goal: A brief statement of the goal
Relevancy: Why do you want to achieve it? Why do you need it now or in the nearest future?
Specificity (Scope): More detailed description: what exactly you want or need to have, know and be able to do.
Measurability (Key results): How to understand that this goal has been achieved? This should be some specific and measurable results such as obtained certificates, received feedback, working processes, fulfilling responsibilities, performed activities etc.
Plan (Steps): What exactly are you going to do to complete this goal? Provide a step-by-step plan with all the necessary information which you will use: links, notes, etc.
Achievements and artifacts: Record everything you've done or created while achieving this goal: documents, book outlines, repositories, links to deployed websites, feedbacks, etc.

Relevancy: Project uses next framework for building pages with SSR, need to catch up on this framework skills
Specificity (Scope):
Get solid knowledge in theoretical topics: 
Page router
App router
SSR/SSG
Page rendering optimizations
What is layout shift
Ways of loading server side data
SEO optimization
Measurability (Key results): Simple pet project with next application is ready

Plan (Steps): Try simple next application using pages server side loading techniques

Relevancy: Project uses GraphQL to aggregate data from microservices, so need to understand how it works
Specificity (Scope):
Get solid knowledge in theoretical topics: 
Queries
Mutations
Resolvers
Context
DataSources
Unit testing of a graphql server
Measurability (Key results): Simple pet project with graphql application is ready
Plan (Steps): Learn how queries and mutations are written and executed
Learn how resolvers and data sources are organised. What is a context.
Learn how to test graphql application
Try a simple graphql server and integrate loading the data into next app

Measurability (Key results): Simple pet project with next application using SWR is ready
